@ ramashu & soletar

Mp4 and Mkv are not better or worse than each other. They are both just containers for a video file. In Yifis case an h264 file made using x264.
The reason one is better than the other is because of the size, or the ripping technique used, or the source ect...
The reason Yify switched to Mp4 is because it is much more compatible with devices.
As for the re-upload, Im sure its because the first was not a BluRay rip...... and Yify has gotten much better at what they do..... ;)
